trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="Send push notifications to authenticated users" description="Learn how to send push notifications to specific" services="mobile-services, notification-hubs" documentationCenter="android" authors="wesmc7777" manager="dwrede" editor=""/>

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="mobile-services" ms.workload="mobile" ms.tgt_pltfrm="mobile-android" ms.devlang="java" ms.topic="article" ms.date="06/16/2015" ms.author="wesmc"/>
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="mobile-services" ms.workload="mobile" ms.tgt_pltfrm="mobile-android" ms.devlang="java" ms.topic="article" ms.date="06/16/2015" ms.author="wesmc"/>

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticated user on any registered device.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticated user on any registered device.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the previous <linkText>push notification[get started with push notifications]</linkText><title></title> tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Unlike the previous <linkText>push notification[get started with push notifications]</linkText><title></title> tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.
trans-unit.target: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the server script is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.
trans-unit.target: Finally, the server script is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:

trans-unit.source:
[Add authentication to your Mobile Services app]
Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.
trans-unit.target:
[Add authentication to your Mobile Services app]
Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.

trans-unit.source:
[Get started with push notifications]
Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target:
[Get started with push notifications]
Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click
trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click

trans-unit.source: This insert script uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all Google Cloud Messaging registrations created by the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: This insert script uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all Google Cloud Messaging registrations created by the logged-in user.
